lead_paragraph: SEGAL--Charles, passed away Thursday, March 24, 2016, of old age. He was born March 27, 1920 to Rose Segal (nee Liebowitz,) and Samuel Segal, in Bayonne NJ. He was husband of Jean Disson Segal, father of Robert, Judith, and Emily Segal, father-in-law to Nancy Bissell Segal, James Kelly, and Andrew Ellis; grandfather of Zoe and Ben Stark, Sarah, Jacob, and Samuel Segal, Dana, Henry, and Rebecca Ellis, and great-grand- father of Jonah Stark. After several years as a social worker at the Veterans Administration, Charles Segal joined his brothers Joe, Hyman, Max, and Arnold in the Segal & Segal real estate company of South Orange, NJ. He was a property developer, builder, landscaper, sculptor, furniture and bowl maker, art collector, supporter of the arts and progressive causes. Charles Segal was an unfailing font of warmth, understanding, wisdom, and helpful giving to his family, many friends, and all who worked with him. He leaves a trove of beautifully made things, a legion of grateful family and friends. Funeral service will be at Bernheim Apter Funeral Home at 11:45am, Sunday, March 27th. Burial will follow at Beth Israel Cemetery in Woodbridge, NJ. 1/3
